title: End2End Coref Resolution By Attention RNN
description: This Kernel implements a modified version of a state-of-art end-to-end neural correference resolution model published in 2017: https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/D17-1018. This completition only focus on a specific case of  the generic reference resolution problem, and we only need pick out the correct mention from two candidates, which simplifies the model implementation. You can compare the result of this model  with the result by other non-RNN based DL models implemented in another kernel: https://www.kaggle.com/keyit92/coreference-resolution-by-mlp-cnn-coattention-nn.
description_lemmatized: kernel implement modified version stateofart endtoend neural correference resolution model published 2017 httpswwwaclweborganthologyd171018 completition focus specific case generic reference resolution problem need pick correct mention two candidate simplifies model implementation compare result model result nonrnn based dl model implemented another kernel httpswwwkagglecomkeyit92coreferenceresolutionbymlpcnncoattentionnn
